thread.title: Garth Brooks to Miss Inauguration for Tour… Shows Support by Praying for Trump and His Family
thread.title_full: Garth Brooks to Miss Inauguration for Tour… Shows Support by Praying for Trump and His Family

author: Ben Marquis
title: Garth Brooks to Miss Inauguration for Tour… Shows Support by Praying for Trump and His Family
text:
BURN: Kim Jong Un Just Told Obama to “Pack Yo’ Bags” in Korean! 
Apparently, “karma” saw fit to have Brooks remain in Cincinnati over the inaugural weekend, as demand for tickets was so high that three extra shows had to be scheduled, preventing him from attending or performing at Trump’s swearing-in ceremony. 
“I’ll tell you, with this whole presidential thing: We got one going out. Pray for him and his family,” said Brooks. “And for the president going in, pray for him and his family to guide this nation.” 
“We can’t thank the Obamas enough for serving this country,” he added. “And may God hold Trump’s hand in the decisions that he makes in this country’s name as well.”   
You can watch his entire video right here. The relevant comments about the inauguration come around the 4:00 minute mark: 
So there you have it, Garth Brooks turned down an invitation to perform at Trump’s inauguration due to previous commitments he had made to his legions of fans who were shelling out their hard-earned dollars to watch him strum a guitar and sing a few tunes. 
As for his request that everybody pray for both the Obama and Trump families as they proceed through this major transition, we wholeheartedly second that motion.
